resources.string: Your device is encrypted or there are other apps installed that require a password or pin to be set. Dislock does not work on encrypted devices or with other apps that require a pin or password. If you wish to use Dislock you will need to decrypt your device, disabled or uninstall any apps that require a pin or password or try to use it anyway. WARNING: Trying to use Dislock in spite of this warning may cause you to lose all data on your device, you have been warned.
You can\'t reset my password, you are a monkey!
You have just reset your lock screen password to \"%1$s\""
Requires you to enter your pin or password once after a trusted device or WiFi network has connected
Only one trusted device can be set at a time. To use more than one, a one time purchase is required. Press Ok to purchase
In app purchases are still loading, please try again in a minute. If this problem persists, please contact the developer
In app purchases are not possible at this time, please try again later. If this problem persists, please contact the developer.
There was an error completing your purchase, please try again later. If this problem persists, please contact the developer.
Control the lock state from your Pebble watch. Options include automatic, locked and unlocked
Select bluetooth devices such as Android Wear, cars and headsets that will unlock your device
Select WiFi networks that will unlock your device
If you are having problems, click here to contact the developer
The password you entered was incorrect, please try again.
The passwords did not match, please try again.
Pin must be at least 4 digits
Pin must be less than 17 digits
Password must be more than 4 characters
Password must be less than 17 characters
